0.text: Innate: Whenever Nilah kills a  minion, she and the nearest allied  champion gain an additional  50% of the experience they would have lost from sharing.

1.text: Innate: Whenever a nearby allied champion uses an ability to  heal or  shield either Nilah or themselves, they both receive a bonus amount equal to 7.5% of the healing or 15% of the shielding after a 0.5-second delay. Bonus shielding lasts as long as the shield that triggered the effect, up to a maximum duration of 4 seconds.

0.text: Passive: Nilah gains  0% − 33% (based on critical strike chance) armor penetration. Her basic attacks and Formless Blade  heal her for 0% − 15% (based on critical strike chance) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to  champions, converting each heal instance beyond maximum health into a  shield that last 6 seconds.

1.text: Active: Nilah cracks her whip-blade in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit, increased by 0% − 100% (based on critical strike chance). Formless Blade can hit structures.

2.text: If Formless Blade is cast during  Slipstream, Nilah leaves behind a wave that is sent towards her location at the end of the dash, dealing the same damage to enemies hit.

3.text: If Formless Blade hits an enemy, Nilah empowers herself for 4 seconds: gaining  125 bonus attack range and  10% − 60% (based on level) bonus attack speed, and causing her basic attacks to strike in a cone that deals 100% AD physical damage to enemies hit. Against secondary non-champion targets, this is reduced to 33% AD for  minions and 10% AD for  monsters.  On-hit effects are applied only to the primary target.

0.text: Active: Nilah envelops herself in mist for 2.25 seconds, during which she becomes  ghosted, gains  bonus movement speed,  reduces all incoming magic damage taken by 25%, and  dodges all non- turret basic attacks.

1.text: Allied champions she touches will also be enveloped for 1.5 seconds, gaining the same effects.

0.text: Active: Nilah  dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, dealing physical damage to enemies she passes through.

1.text: Nilah periodically stocks a Slipstream charge, up to a maximum of 2.

2.text: Slipstream  resets Nilah's basic attack timer.  Formless Blade and  Apotheosis can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Nilah whirls her whip-blade over 1 second, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds. She then bursts to deal physical damage and  pull them 250 units towards her. Each hit also  slows targets by 10% for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.

1.text: Nilah  heals herself and nearby allied champions for 30% − 45% (based on critical strike chance) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to  champions, reduced to 10% against non-champions, converting each heal instance beyond maximum health into a  shield that last 6 seconds.

2.text: Nilah is unable to basic attack and cast her other abilities during Apotheosis, but she is able to move.

0.text: Innate: Whenever Nilah kills a  minion, she and the nearest allied  champion gain an additional  50% of the experience they would have lost from sharing.

1.text: Innate: Whenever a nearby allied champion uses an ability to  heal or  shield either Nilah or themselves, they both receive a bonus amount equal to 7.5% of the healing or 15% of the shielding after a 0.5-second delay. stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+20% attack speed
+20% critical strike chance
+7% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus attack damage, and 70 bonus health.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs 250 − 630 (based on level) damage for 3 seconds and 15 − 35 (based on level) bonus attack damage for 8 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

Active: Nilah envelops herself in mist for 2.25 seconds, during which she becomes  ghosted, gains  bonus movement speed,  reduces all incoming magic damage taken by 25%, and  dodges all non- turret basic attacks.
